name: ContentDefinitions_GetContentDefinition
description:
Gets a ContentDefinition by ID. When successful, the response is the requested ContentDefinition.
            If unsuccessful, an appropriate ApiError is returned.

contentDefinitionID.description: The ID of the ContentDefinition to get.

includeAttributes.description: Names of Attributes to include when retrieving this definition. This should be a comma-separated list. If not provided, Attributes are not included. If '*', all Attributes are included.

$block: The definition of the content for submission

$ul: **ContentDefinitionID**: The ID of this content definition.
**Description**: The description used on the package type in the AGCO Update System
**Name**: The name of this content. Name must be valid for Attribute on PackageType.
**PackageTypeID**: Read Only. The ID of the package type used for this content.
